dict.acceptation: 商业，交易；生意；事务，业务；职业，行业；

sent.orig: With Internet and distributed computing technologies, enterprises can achieve business collaboration in business-to-business (B2B) e-business.
sent.trans: 借助于互联网和分布式计算技术，企业与企业之间可以完成业务的协作，这就是所谓的企业对企业(B2B)的电子商务(e-business)。

sent.orig: The concept of customer self-service is central to e-business.
sent.trans: e-business的精髓是顾客自助服务的概念。

sent.orig: This is e-business-here the strength and reliability of traditional information technology meet the Internet.
sent.trans: 这就是e－business,传统信息科技的力量和可靠性与互联网的有机结合。

sent.orig: Concepts of e-Business, e-Marketing, e-Government, e-Management, e-Home, e-Library, e-learning, etc. are becoming popular through the world.
sent.trans: e-Business、e-Marketing、e-Government、e-Management、e-Home、e-Library、e-Learn-ing等概念正在全世界范围内迅速流行。

sent.orig: I completed business administration management, sales management, economics, accounting statistics, business statistics, business English.
sent.trans: 我修完了工商行政管理、营销管理、经济学、会计学、商业统计、以及商业英语。
